Question
========

Z is a standard normally distributed stochastic variable. The probability that Z takes on a value between -1.32 and 0.43 is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2402
* 0.2598
* 0.427
* 0.573

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2402: Incorrect
* 0.2598: Incorrect
* 0.427: Incorrect
* 0.573: Correct
